service.name: chart-generator
service.description: Professional-grade data visualization generation with customizable styling for business reports, research papers, and analytics dashboards

postgres.purpose: Store chart templates, custom styles, generation history, and configuration data

minio.purpose: Store generated chart assets and large data files with organized bucket structure

redis.purpose: Cache frequently used styles, templates, and generated charts for performance optimization

setup.description: Initialize Chart Generator with all dependencies

steps.name: build-api
steps.run: cd api && go mod download && go build -o chart-generator-api .
steps.description: Build Go chart generation API binary

steps.name: setup-database
steps.description: Initialize PostgreSQL schema and seed default styles

steps.name: show-urls
steps.description: Display service access URLs and usage examples

develop.description: Start chart generator with API server and UI

steps.name: start-api
steps.description: Start Go API server in background

steps.name: show-urls
steps.description: Display all running service URLs and CLI info

test.description: Comprehensive testing of chart generation capabilities

steps.name: test-go-build
steps.run: cd api && go build -o test-build . && rm test-build

steps.name: test-cli-basic-generation
steps.description: Test CLI chart generation with sample data

steps.name: test-native-endpoints
steps.run: curl -sf http://localhost:${CHART_API_PORT}/chart-generator -X POST -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"chart_type":"bar","data":[{"x":"Test","y":42}]}' && curl -sf http://localhost:${CHART_API_PORT}/validate-data -X POST -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"data":[{"x":"A","y":10}]}' && curl -sf http://localhost:${CHART_API_PORT}/styles
steps.description: Test native Go endpoints replacing n8n workflows

steps.name: test-database-schema
steps.run: resource-postgres execute 'SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_name IN ("chart_templates", "chart_styles", "chart_instances");'
